definition[0]: the work of explaining to the public what an organization does, so that they will understand it and approve of it
example[0]: The band have been getting a lot of good PR recently.
example[1]: Many say it was no more than a PR exercise  (=something done to make people think something is good).
definition[1]: public relations; the work of persuading people to have a good opinion of an organization, company etc
example[3]: Good PR is of paramount importance these days.
example[4]: The company has hired a PR firm to promote its media image.
